info.title: Argovis API
info.description: REST API for Argo profiles, platforms, selections, BGC data, gridded products, etc.

servers.description: Server Hosted by University of Colorado, Boulder
Local server for testing and development

tags.name: grid
tags.description: Gridded products derived from Argo floats, simulation, or satalite product

tags.name: profiles
tags.description: Profile data, including BGC and profile metadata

tags.name: dacs
tags.description: Summary and metadata for data assembly centers represented in the dataset

get.summary: Find and filter atmo river shapes.
Probability distribution field for a float at point lat-lon after forcastDays.
Sum of probability distribution field over a region for a float starting at point lat-lon after forcastDays.
Tropical cyclone search and filter.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Keys of data to include. Return only documents that have all data requested, within the pressure range if specified. Accepts ~ negation to filter out documents including the specified data. Omission of this parameter will result in metadata only responses.

get.summary: Tropical cyclone metadata search and filter.
List all possible values for certain tc query string parameters

parameters.name: parameter
parameters.description: TC query string parameter to summarize possible values of.

get.summary: Search and filter for grid named in path

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Keys of data to include. Return only documents that have all data requested, within the pressure range if specified. Accepts ~ negation to filter out documents including the specified data. Omission of this parameter will result in metadata only responses.

get.summary: Metadata for grids by ID
GO-SHIP search and filter.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Keys of data to include. Return only documents that have all data requested, within the pressure range if specified. Accepts ~ negation to filter out documents including the specified data. Omission of this parameter will result in metadata only responses.

get.summary: GO-SHIP metadata search and filter.
List all possible values for certain tc query string parameters

parameters.name: parameter
parameters.description: GO-SHIP query string parameter to summarize possible values of.

get.summary: Search, reduce and download profile data.
List profile IDs that match a search
Provides a summary of the profile database.
List all possible values for certain profile query string parameters

parameters.name: parameter
parameters.description: /profiles query string parameter to summarize possible values of.

get.summary: Provides metadata for a specified platform.
Provides a list of platforms with their most recent known report and position.
Provides a list of all Argo platform IDs with BGC data.
Provides summary data for each data assembly center.
Search, reduce and download drifter data.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Keys of data to include. Return only documents that have all data requested, within the pressure range if specified. Accepts ~ negation to filter out documents including the specified data. Omission of this parameter will result in metadata only responses.

get.summary: Search, reduce and download drifter metadata.
List all possible values for certain drifter query string parameters

parameters.name: parameter
parameters.description: /drifters query string parameter to summarize possible values of.

arDate.name: date
arDate.description: three hour increments starting at 2004-01-01T00:00:00 and ending at 2017-04-02T03:00:00

arID.name: _id
arID.description: ID of an atmospheric river object

startDate.name: startDate
startDate.description: ISO 8601 UTC date-time formatted string indicating the beginning of the time period of interest.

endDate.name: endDate
endDate.description: ISO 8601 UTC date-time formatted string indicating the end of the time period of interest.

gridName.name: gridName
gridName.description: name of the gridded product to query.

presRange.name: presRange
presRange.description: Pressure range in dbar to filter for; levels outside this range will not be returned.

dac.name: dac
dac.description: Data Assembly Center to search for. See /profiles/vocabulary?parameter=dac for list of options.

profileSource.name: source
profileSource.description: Experimental program source(s) to search for; document must match all sources to be returned. Accepts ~ negation to filter out documents. See /profiles/vocabulary?parameter=source for list of options.

woceline.name: woceline
woceline.description: WOCE line to search for. See /profiles/vocabulary?parameter=woceline for list of options.

cchdo_cruise.name: cchdo_cruise
cchdo_cruise.description: CCHDO cruise ID to search for. See /profiles/vocabulary?parameter=cchdo_cruise for list of options.

profileID.name: id
profileID.description: Unique profile ID to search for.

platformID.name: platform
platformID.description: Unique platform ID to search for.

polygon.name: polygon
polygon.description: array of [lon, lat] vertices describing a polygon bounding the region of interest; final point must match initial point

multipolygon.name: multipolygon
multipolygon.description: array of polygon regions; region of interest is taken as the intersection of all listed polygons.

box.name: box
box.description: box region of interest described as [[lower left lon, lower left lat], [upper right lon, upper right lat]]

center.name: center
center.description: center to measure max radius from when defining circular region of interest; must be used in conjunction with query string parameter 'radius'.

radius.name: radius
radius.description: km from centerpoint when defining circular region of interest; must be used in conjunction with query string parameter 'center'.

data.name: data
data.description: Keys of data to include. Return only documents that have all data requested, within the pressure range if specified. Accepts ~ negation to filter out documents including the specified data. Omission of this parameter will result in metadata only responses. See /profiles/vocabulary?parameter=data for possible values.

forcastDays.name: forcastDays
forcastDays.description: number of days over which to project Argo float drift
